description: Base preset intended to contain all security-related Renovate configurations. It centralizes
security-focused settings for reuse across presets and projects. When you extend this preset:
- Security-related updates get a clear 'security' label in addition to 'dependencies'.
- Vulnerability alerts (including OSV) are enabled, and PR titles avoid the '[SECURITY]'
For customization examples (e.g., changing/removing the default 'security' label, adding extra
Remove the default '[SECURITY]' commit message suffix from security vulnerability PR titles
to keep them compatible with changelog/release tooling (commitMessageSuffix is set to empty)
See defaults for other vulnerabilityAlerts fields https://docs.renovatebot.com/configuration-options/#vulnerabilityalerts
